details_of_course: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the fundamentals of C programming, covering topics such as variables, control structures, functions, and memory management.
Learn the basic algorithms and data structures used in computer science, including sorting, searching, and graph algorithms, with a focus on algorithm analysis and design.
Explore C++ programming in the context of data structures and algorithms. Learn about classes, objects, templates, and their applications in solving data structure problems.
This course introduces fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, along with their implementations and usage.
Learn the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) using Python. Topics include classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and object-oriented design.
Gain a deep understanding of software engineering principles, methodologies, and best practices, including requirements engineering, design, and testing.
Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing concepts, including cloud architecture, virtualization, and cloud deployment models.
Learn the basics of database management with MySQL, including database design, querying, and data manipulation using SQL.
Enhance your problem-solving skills and critical thinking abilities through algorithmic challenges and real-world problem-solving scenarios.
